teams.name: Nerdfighters
teams.loan_because:
We aim to decrease world suck.

And this is how:
www.eludehcs.no/kiva/nerdfighters/nerdfighters20120916.png by Nerdfighter Ole Bendik
teams.description:
We're Nerdfighters! We fight against suck; we fight for awesome! We fight using our brains, our hearts, our calculators, and our trombones.

Happy lending!

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/KivaNerds

teams.name: Georgia State University
teams.loan_because: We want to help people make a difference in their communities.
teams.description: We are students dedicated to seeing others succeed in their endeavors. We have been blessed and so we chose to bless in return.

teams.name: McGraw Hill Financial
teams.loan_because:
Corporate Responsibility is fundamental to MHFI. It guides who we are, how we conduct ourselves and how we interact with those around us.

Corporate Responsibility Essentials at MHFI encompass:

– Financial Essentials – we help to provide the fundamental financial knowledge that can build better lives, stronger communities and stable economies and financial markets. 

– Community Essentials – we help deploy and foster the resources and skills that lead to smarter, stronger, more inclusive communities. Our employees are integral partners in our dedication to this critical purpose. 

– Environmental Essentials – we offer innovative business services that promote sustainability while applying best practice to reduce the environmental footprint of our operations.
teams.description:
McGraw Hill Financial is a high-growth, high-margin benchmarks, content and analytics company serving the capital and commodity markets. MHFI believes a responsible business is one that delivers value for investors, customers, employees and communities; makes wise use of natural resources; and treats people fairly.

We are home to some of the most iconic brands in finance and business, including: Standard & Poor’s Ratings Services, S&P; Capital IQ, S&P; Dow Jones Indices, Platts, J.D. Power, and McGraw Hill Construction. Our independent credit ratings, indices, analytics, price assessments and research provide clients with the essential intelligence to manage risk and identify opportunities to grow.

teams.name: Sweden
teams.description: Sometimes it's easier to see that what a difference we each make by looking at what we do together -- And having more people together might even convince others to join and lend as well. Feel free to join up if you're a Kiva member in Sweden!

teams.name: Team Tomco
teams.loan_because: we believe that a little bit of help for an entrepreuner at the right time can have far reaching benefits for a community
teams.description: High tech electronics company - nerds who want to make a difference

teams.description:
We know we are one human family.

teams.name: Catholic Kiva
teams.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
teams.description: Anyone is welcome to join our group.  The team is just for fun and to help build community.

teams.name: Kiva Jews
teams.loan_because: Tikkun Olam - making the world a better place.
teams.description: One of Judaism's most famous scholars, Maimonides, said that the highest form of charity is to help someone no longer need charity - and lending to Kiva does that.

teams.name: Pace Mamma's
teams.loan_because: Pace means peace in Italian and we are mother's helping mothers in community.  We are hoping that by helping other mother's we will be helping the next generation of children to know that each person counts and everyone deserves a chance to live a happy, healthy, peaceful life. Women all over the world care about one another and when you help a woman, you help her entire community!
teams.description: We are women from all walks of life, from all over the world.  We are moms, professionals, business owners, teachers, artists, doctors, nurses, yoga teachers, doulas, executives, police officers, singers, wives, farmers, lawyers, you name it we do it.  We care about our world, we care about our earth and we care about our children and our families.  And we know there are women who do not have the opportunities we have and we'd like to even the playing field a bit by showing our support with these loans, knowing that we are all part of the greater human family, of which every person is an integral part.  It is a small world after all.

teams.name: Tootelo
teams.loan_because: We loan because we care about our community, both local and global.
teams.description:
We're a group of co-workers based on the south shore of Montreal. We come from various cultural backgrounds, we're of different genders and age groups, and we're all here to be part of something amazing. 

Check out our individual profiles.

teams.name: Team CANADA
teams.loan_because:
So little means so much. And because we are so fortunate to be able to lend with the luxury of not worrying about whether we ever see that money again, while the clients borrow with the hope and determination that they will be able to repay, and improve their lives along the way.

Check out fundraising loans already being supported by Team Canada:
http://www.kiva.org/team/team_canada/loans?status=fundRaising
